alert.note: Alert for Allen; Putnam; Van Wert (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 9:50PM EST until January 09 at 12:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Freezing rain and drizzle. Ice accumulations from a light glaze to around one hundredths of an inch...mainly on roads and sidewalks. * WHERE...Portions of northern Indiana and northwest Ohio. * WHEN...Until midnight EST tonight. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Icy conditions will persist through late evening. A light glaze of ice has already been reported in Wells, IN and Ottawa, OH. Temperatures right around freezing will rise into the mid to upper 30s, transitioning precipitation to rain or drizzle.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
